column4: Hey guys, anyone have any clue why video chat would not be working in firefox under 10.10 maverick? Cheese will show my cam up fine but things like Omegle, Tinychat, Chatroulette just don't work
if you mean in 'flash' in firefox. thers known issues with flash accessing webcams. (ive never tried it)

thers a program called 'webcamstudio' that can help some of those flash-based things (and other apps) make use of your webcvam. Its like a virtual webcam. that sort of works as a front end/tweaking tool.
yep. Its a java app.  ive not tried it in some time.
